trends: There has been one other sighting in Port Jefferson Station
There were no other sightings in Port Jefferson Station on or around October 5th 2013
Summary: saw a bright fireball in sky that moved
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a bright red light on my way home from ork.I pulled over an ot out to see and it was moving west.I pulled over cause I didn't see any plane lights.Another cat pulleid over and saw the light too. We even saw a plane fly right in the same horizon ,and that's when I can tell it was way higher then the plane. It started then to slowly loose light and faded away. Now I'm not one with social media, I don't do this really at all.I just can't figure this out. I'm hoping more people saw this that night and hoping if more this site can help. Red dot in sky I youtubed and its exactly what I saw.
